price: Faraó disse aos dignitários a seu redor: "Por certo, este é um mágico sapiente."
arabic: قَالَ لِلۡمَلَإِ حَوۡلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla lil'mala-i ḥawlahu inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
